1.content:
Your alarm clock rings on the makeshift endtable next to your messy bed. The clock's ring ends with a thunk as it was knocked over by a tired teen. Rubbing your eyes, you look out the foggy window to see old and busted houses with old rusty cars on the driveway.

You hated this place, you LOATHE this place because you didn't like the fact that you couldnt walk down the sidewalk without having the insurance of a knife or several other people by your side for protection. Your job wasn't helping much either, making minimum wage working at the Burger Emporium.

You try to squeeze a good idea of how to make a decent living out of your head, but most of them require having enough money to leave your parent's house, and your parents never had that much money in the first place.

Peaking at your guitar, an old Sunburst Fender Stratocaster, gave you an idea. You only thought it was possible in your dreams, but after some thought you reconsidered that previous judgment.

Before you started your plan to start a rock band however, you decided that getting cleaned up was first prioraty at the moment. Looking in the mirror, you gazed at yourself, a...
1.title: A Rock Star is Born

choices: Pick up your friends and take them to your garage
Meet at one of their houses
Meet them at the music store
111.content:
A normal looking teen human, black hair, brown eyes, and wore a scratched up pair of glasses (because contacts are too expensive). Brushing your teeth, you thought of the possibilities and the overall "band" concept. You first thought who you should call to be in your band, you didn't have many friends but they were good friends.

Going through the list you remembered that your friend Vio, a human like you except taller, had strange white hair, and was very quiet in a dark mysterious way, played the Double Bass (basicly it's a bigger vesion of the cello). You imagined how easy it would be for him to go to the Bass guitar sence the two are very similar to play.

You then remembered your good friend Greg, a quite fat dragon with green scales and yellow underbelly with a smile so inocent that it was in a way creapy. He played the drums so he could play in the school's jazz band, so he was pritty decent.

You then spat out the tooth paste and washed your face before putting some clothes on. You thought about who your singer might be, but you decided that you needed to get your friends together so they have a say in it.

Some time after you called Vio and Greg, you were driving in your used red scratched up van that had a newly remade apostery consisting of mostly Duck Tape. You were going to...
111.title: The Making of the Band

1111.content: You pick up your friends and take them to your garaoge. You then show them the band equipment and you let them try out your instruments. They really like them. So then you ask them to join you and make a band. They say.....
1111.title: Pick up your friends and take them to your garage

11111.content: "Sure why not?" everyone says. You start playing for a little bit. Everyone sounds good except for Vio. "What's the matter Vio?' He replies in his burly voice "Man I can't stand this. It's too small." You shake your head when a idea pops in your head. "Try this you hand him your 6 feet long keyboard. "Okay lets try it." You sound good all you need is a bass. "Hey do you guys need a bass?" You see this tall and lanky guy with a green hat , red shirt and blue jeans. His shoes have multiple words in permanent marker onto his broken down black nikes. "My name is Luke. And just let me do one thing. Or I'll be gone if you don't want me to be in this band ." He starts with a simple slap-pluck- strum. You are just giggling at this point. But, he starts getting faster and faster and faster. And before you realize it everyone in the band is standing in applause.
11111.title: Yes

choices: Will's going to be the singer
1112.content:
Will talked with his friends over the phone and decided that they would meet at Greg's house because a drum set was hard to carry around. With the small practice amp and his guitar in the back of the van, Will drove to Greg's house.

Greg's place was a bit bigger than Will's, being two stories, but that didn't help the fact that it still needed a bit of repair. Will drove up to be greated with an open garage door with Greg behind his drum set and Vio holding his Double Bass.

"Let me guess" Greg said as he watched Will get out of his car with the guitar "you want to make a band."
"Right on the money" Will said with a strum of his guitar.
Vio grumbled "it would be if we HAD any."
"That's alright," Will asured them "after we land a few gigs we will not have to worry as much about money."

Greg scratche his head before asking "but what about a singer? I can't sing because I play drums, Vio will never sing unless we used a crowbar and even that is ify."
1112.title: Meet at one of their houses

11121.content:
"Oh dear mother of the great Draco" Greg sighed as a slightly used sports car drove up with a female naga and a very timid fox inside. The naga slithered out of the car, her vibrant yellow, red, and black stripes of a coral snake shone in the sun while the timmid fox walked out wearing a simple pink top with blue jeans.

"I KNEW YOU WERE STALKING ME SASHA, YOU SNAKE IN THE GRASS!" Greg yelled as he stood up from his drum set.
"Stalking is such a hard word" Sasha said with a very sexy tone to her voice, "I prefer the words "highly intrested"
Will walked up to the naga and said "so, you want to join the band? So what do you have to offer?"
Greg almost lost his scailes as he yelled "ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND!"
"My hands are tied at the moment" replied Will "and if she or the fox can sing then we need to let them join."
"Yah, Karey can certanly sing, and I can play the guitar pritty good." Sasha said slithering around Will. Will looked at the fox and said "but she hasn't said a word."
"Yah, about that" Sasha said "Karey is a little... shy."
"I noticed" Vio said before walking up to the fox and asked "so, can you sing?"
Karey nodded yes before Vio asked "what, I can't hear you."
"i can sing" Karey mumbled.
"I cant hear you, speak up."
"I can sing" Karey said a little louder.
"WHAT, I CAN BARALY HEAR YOU!" Vio yelled
"I CAN SING YOU DEAF RETARD!" Karey then yelled at Vio.
"Nice yelling voice, didn't even crack, as stiff as a rock." Vio then said as he turned to Will "so, you think she might be good enough, even though we might have to work on the shyness problem."

So...
11121.title: Someone drives into the driveway

111211.content:
"Alright, you can join." Will said as he held his hand out to Karey and shook her paw.
"NOOO!" Greg yelled as he slammed his head into one of the drums.
"Oh yesssss" Sasha said with a hiss and started to slither towards Greg untill Vio slammed his heal on her tail.
"EEEEYOUCH!" Sasha yelped, recoiling her tail and inspecting it.
"Now listen here," Vio said to Sasha with a calm voice "you may be in the band, but ONLY because you brought a singer and not because your essencial."
The naga started to wring her tail in anger before she yelped relizing it still hurt.
"Now, if I or Will see a tiny flash of you trying to man handle Greg without his permission then I will have to kick you out of the band. Is that clear?"
Sasha nodded her head up and down in response as Vio gave a thumbs up and said "good, now let's started with the rehersal."

The Rehersal ends up
111211.title: We have a singer

1113.content: You have decided to meet your friends at the music store to find some inspiration of some kind. The music store was probably a 5 to 10 minute walk from your house and you quickly decide to make your way to the music store, on the way there you have ran into...
1113.title: Meet them at the music store

choices: help Carl the store manager for money."
11133.content:
Will walked down the sidewalk before he bumped into someone quite hard, knocking them down.
"Hey watch it!" Will barked agressivly, trying to look more tough mostly because if you didn't in this neighborhood you would easly get trampled over. Unfortunatly this wasn't the kind you should go out and try to act rude in front of because she was on the ground and crying. From the red plumage you knew her to be a young robin avian about sixteen, but more specificly you knew her personaly.
"Debbie!?" you ask worried, dropping the whole tough guy act.
The little red robbin looked up at Will shaking before giving a feeble smile, trying to hold in her tears.
"Will?" Debbie replied.
"I'm sorry to scair you like that, you know how this place is." Will replied
Debbie gave a shy nod, being the very shy and untalkative types, yet she had a gifted mind. Graduating High School at the age of sixteen and pritty much dominated the science fairs, unfortunatly her parents were in some illegal deals of there own and because of that made Debbie lose her scholarship.

Will helped Debbie up, helping wipe off her tears. "So, your going to the music store too?" Will asked, Debbie shaking her head yes in reply.
"I am going to
11133.title: One of your classmates

choices: Your friends are already there waiting
Your the first one there and have to wait
111331.content:
Guitar? Incomplete band?
'I'll walk you.'
Debbie looked up appreciatively.
'Thanks.'
'So,' tactful, tactful, you think, 'Your friend plays?'
Smooth. Right to the point, well done! You roll your eyes at your undirect approach - she'll surely see right through it.
'Yeah. So?'
What to say. Why on earth would you be interested. Smart move!
'I, um, I play.'
She looks up at you again, amused this time.
'And maybe, well, your friend could, he could, um, play, you know, with me. Sometime. Or whatever.'
She giggles.
'I'm sure SHE'D love to rock with you!'
'She?'
'She.'
'Sweet, we could hook up, next week maybe.'
A girl, damn. You can't have a girl in a rock band. Better find something to fill your time next week with.
Suddenly the music store sprang up and
111331.title: Pick up a friends guitar."

choices: You head into the music store
You take them back to your place for brainstorming
1113311.content:
“Yo, Will! Thought you were gonna be a no show!”
“Sorry guys, bumped into a friend along the way.”
“So I see, and brought her with you. Fifth member of the band is she?”
“No, no, no, she’s um...”
“Picking up my friend’s guitar.”
“Oh yeah, that was it! Wait a minute, fifth member?”
“Oh yeah, we’ve brought Jesse with us.”
For the first time Will noticed the lad standing behind his two best friends. Will held his hand out to greet the newest band member. As he did so, and Jesse stepped forward he noticed how this new friend seemed to glow.
“So, what do you play?”
“Rhythm guitar.”
“And, sorry, but are you, human?”
“Half, I’m a Volant,” at seeing his baffled face, he explained, “I’m a flyer.”
“Oh, wicked! Never met a vo, vo...”
“Volant. We’re pretty rare, something to do with the genes... well, it’s complicated and there’s only a few true bloods left.”
1113311.title: New Bandmate

11133111.content:
“Tony, mate! How’s it hanging, dude?”
“Will, long time, man, where’ve you been hiding?”

Tony Malone was owner of the music store that gave you the odd job every now and again when you were still in High School, before you started at the Burger Emporium.

“Slave to the burger, these days, man!”
“Still playing though?”
“Of course, whenever I can. In fact, now that you come to mention it. I’d love to play more... in a band.”
“A band? You, in a band? And where do intend to find this band of yours.”

At this you indicate your fellow companions, who you suddenly remember followed you in.

“Five of you? Sure you’re not the School Orchestra? More members, shorter the career.”
“We’re not like that. And, and there’s only four of us!”

You look around and realise that there are five of you standing in the store. You’d forgotten about Debbie and quickly introduce her.

“She’s come to collect a guitar. For her friend. She’s not with us.”

At this, Tony shuffles back behind the till and produces the reservation forms.

“Will! Watch the shop while I nip ‘round back for this order.”

While he’s gone...
11133111.title: Tony Malone

choices: Maybe think of another idea for a way to leave
112.content:
In the long mirror that your grand mother gave you, you look at yourself. Your long sandy blond hair wavy and curly like a kid's doll was impossible to style, but still you liked it dearly. Your eyes are the color of the beautifulest ocean, the turquoise emotional eyes. Well, right now they were just tired from the lumpy bed. She has a little button nose that would only look normal on a little kid, but on her just made her look that much younger. Her long lips that are always curled in a humorous grin kind of like the Joker. She's kind of tall with curves that our masked by her long jeans and t-shirt.

All her friends play an instrument since ti was the only think worth doing in this neighborhood.

She remembers that her friend Radko played the drums, he wasn't the best but at least he can play and his learning. Radko is a mix of cat and human. His big yellowish green eyes with slits for pupils and the night vision that seemed to help us so many times. His long nose that could pass for a beak any day and his long lips that our always sneering. His long whiskers that sprout from his rosy cheeks and his ultrasonic hearing, even if he has normal human looking ears. He has a mane of luscious black hair and his agility is nearly impossible to beat.

She knows that Julian plays the rhymed guitar which would be a change from all of the other bands. Julian is a demon with long dark purple wings that basically let's him fly when he is lazy, which saves him the trouble of buying a car. He has translucent eyes that can see pretty far off. He has two slits for his nose kind of like a snake and long teeth that makes him look evil, which he isn't.

Her friend Trilania plays the bass like a pro and always makes us wonder how come she hasn't left yet. Trilania is a human like me, she has long black hair with electric blue and vivid purple highlights. She has a skinny nose and normal blood red lips. Her eyes are the color of dry grass. She, in a way, kind of looks like me.

The idea sounds perfect, but maybe they won't sound good together. None of them ever played with someone else.

What should she do?
112.title: Female

122.content:
You were a stunning red female dragon as you were gifted with a very good set of hips and a face that kills, unfortunatly they didn't have scholarships for "the prittyest dragon" because you would have been in the top ten in the entire area. Your name was Shelonkan Respute, but everyone called you Shela, and by everyone you mean every friend that you knew, which was many. This was thanks from your very nice and comforting personality as most of your friends were old friends that you have known sence kindergarden, a few out casts because of their looks, and the few good people in this neighborhood. Or in other words eight friends that you could pick for your band.

You brushed off you scales with a towel before getting into a tank top as you thought of the options of who to include into your band.

The first one that came to your mind was Splotchy, a kid you met in Junior High and were friends ever sence. He was a very good artist but not good at anything else because he was missing an arm after getting caught up in a very bad gang fight on accadent. You specificly thought of him first because he had the best and most varied singing voice you have ever heard. You only know this because he whent to your house to take a shower because his shower was being worked on, and he sung very loud in the shower both you and your parents knew about his tallent.

Another person came into your mind was Jessie, a naga girl that you knew for just about forever. She was a very big girl, being a gaboon viper naga, and was your first choice as drummer when you played the video game Rock Band, so why not pick her as a drummer in a real band?

You head to the phone to call one of them to see if they would join your new band, but who to call first.
122.title: The start of a band

1221.content:
The phone rang for a second as you impatiently tapped your foot on the ground for Splotchy to answer. Your mind jumped as you heard a click and Splotchy's voice on the other side.
"Yes, this is Splotchsonrequence Inkston." You heard a ho hum voice on the other side of the line say.
"Splotchy?"
"Shela, it's nice to hear from you" Splotchy said on the other line "is there anything I can help you with?"
"I am starting a band" you replied, followed by a small moment of silence over the line before Splotchy going "and your calling me why?"
"I wan't you to be my singer" There was a moment of laughter as you heard Splotchy said "you should know better that I can't sing."
"Oh yes you can, I heard you when you were singing in my shower a few years back." You replied in a "as a matter of fact" kind of tone.

Splotchy sighed as he pointed out "everyone sounds better in the shower."
"But will you come over to my place so I can prove you wrong" you asked, trying to sound sweet.

There was a sigh over the phone before Splotchy said "alright, but beleve me when I say that I am not that good of singer. I am an artist, not a pop star."
But in your mind, you hoped to change that. After hanging up the phone you consider what to do next
1221.title: Splotchy, the singer

choices: Waited for Splotchy and Jessie to arrive
12211.content:
You dialed Jessie's number and waited for her response, your tail wagged in antisipation hoping that you didn't get the dreaded "I am not home, please call back" from the answering machine.
"I am not home right now, please call after..."
"Oh, drat" you said into the phone, but there was a pause before a familiar voice came over the phone.
"Hey girl, I was just kidding yah" came a woman's voice with a slight New York acsent.
"Jessie, it's good to hear you," you replied very happily, "so, how are things going?"
"Not very good, just got fired from my job at Taco Hut" Jessie replied disapointed, "kind of hard to navigate those crowded kitches for a big girl like me." You nodded, knowing well that she couldn't see you.
"So, I had this great idea" you told Jessie, "I was thinking of starting a band and you could be the drummer."
"Sure, why not," Jessie responded, "oh, here's Splotchy, HEY SPLOTCHY, CAN YOU GIVE ME A RIDE?"
"Well that was good timing" you said to yourself as you heard the phone hang up.

You then
12211.title: Calling Jessie

choices: buy one from the local pawn shop."
122112.content:
Waited for them to arive.

You stood in front of your garage, waiting for the ever familiar sound of the Splotchrod (basicaly Splotchy's pride). You twitched a little as you heard the thunderious roar of the big block engine and there it was. With huge rear tires, green paintjob with black splotch marks and everything else plated in chrome. The hot rod was certanly one of the very few expensive things in your neck of the woods. The driver side door then opened up for a man, maybe a little older than you, to step out. He was certanly easy to spot, wearing a large ink stained robe along with ink stained bell bottoms, a thick scarf wrapped around his neck, covering anything below his noes, and a beret on top of his head. Well of course he was missing his right arm and what was left of that sleeve was ripped up and covered in dried blood.

Jessie on the other hand slithered from the other side, her long snake body filling up both the front seat and the back seats. Her slightly wider head was traditional to her Gaboon heratage along with the brown, dead leaf, coloration of her scails.

"I am very glad to see you again" you said as you hugged them both, Splotchy slightly dazed as he was not one to even be touched by a hot girl, even if she was a diffrent race.
"So, let's get inside and start rehersing" you told them before watching Jessie get the Rock Band drum set out.
"Uh, Jessie" you said kind of embarased "but I ment to make a real band, not a video game band."
Jessie then looked at you confused, replying "so, we are actualy making a real band?"
"Yah" you replied.
"But, I don't have any real drum sets" Jessie said.
You then thought about it for a second before saying "how about we...
122112.title: Waited for Splotchy and Jessie to arrive

choices: Your girlfriend, whos daddy owns a night club, and they need a musician.
Some of your friends, who want to form a band, and they need a guitarist.
A talent agent from a music company. They are looking for new material.
141.content:
Male eighteen year old fox anthro. While not exactly the most handsom person in the world, more than a few of your female classmates had been after you on occasion, asking for you to take them out on a date or some such thing.

As you look at the rest of yourself, you notice that your finger and toeclaws seemed to be getting a little longer and sharper than you like, and your orange and white fur was starting to fall out a bit, just like it did every summer.

"Well, I best get to grooming myself, and trim my claws," you say out loud. "After all, I don't want to scratch my baby."

***

After you are done in the bathroom, and wearing a nice comfortable pair of pants and a t-shirt, you decide to lay down on the couch, where you wonder what you are going to do to make some money.

Suddenly, the doorbell rings, causing you to jump up and run to it. At you open it up, you see...
141.title: Male

choices: An Time Specific NightClub (30's and 80's for example)
1411.content:
It was your girlfriend Merry, she was a fox like you but not only was her shape more elegant and her look more feminine, but her fur was a darker orange to maybe an orangeish red color.

"Hey Foxy Loxy" Merry chimed using your pet name that personally you didn't like, but you never told her that.

"Morning Merry" you replied with a smile, "so what do I owe for this occasion?"

"The band in my father's nightclub" she said with mixed feelings, "they kind of just got up and left for a better provider and my daddy needs a guitarist to complete the substitute band."

"And you told him that I played guitar" you filled in, "how did he feel about it."

"Quite well, though he still grumbled half the time" Merry admitted, "so you should probably bring your A game on stage." You gulped, her father was less of a fox and more of a wolf, and he didn't like you much for the fact that you lived in the slummyer part of the slums. Still, he was kind enough to at least let you two go out on a date here and there occasionally.

"Well, I would love to prove that I'm reliable to your father" you said gleefully.

"Good, now let's get in the car before someone jacks it" Merry said racing over to a slightly dinged up compact and waiting for you to get your guitar.

The night club in question was...
1411.title: Opertunity Comes Nocking

1511.content:
18-year-old wolf. You have gray fur with black hair on your head in a long, shaggy mop-top style. You have emerald green eyes and are fairly skinny. As you look at your reflection, you realize you look a bit out of it..
"That's what you get when police sirens keep you up half the night, I guess," You say to yourself.
You let out a big yawn and head to the bathroom, where you take a quick shower and brush your teeth. As you brush you watch the usual bristles fall from the toothbrush. That happens often, seeing as how your toothbrush isn't designed for fangs as sharp as yours. After you spit your toothpaste out you go into your bedroom to pick out some clothes. You decide on a pair of denim jeans, a Led Zeppelin T-shirt, and a pair of Vans Off the Wall shoes.
As you walk downstairs to grab some breakfast, you hear a ringing; your phone. You look at the caller ID and see that it's your friend, Chase.
"Hey, man, what's up?" you greet him as you pick up the receiver.
You've known chase for pretty much as long as you can remember. He's an average sized human with long, brown hair that comes down to his shoulders. He's practically obsessed with the Ramones, owning all of their albums and watching nearly every concert by them that was ever taped. But, of course, the Ramones aren't all he listens to.
"Not a lot," he replies, "I'm bored out of my mind actually, wanna do something? You're off work today, right?"
"Yeah, I'm off," You reply, "But, do what? There's nothing to do here, and I don't trust that piece of crap in my driveway to get us five blocks."
"You've got a point," Chase says. It was no wonder you two are friends, you're almost in the exact same situation. Chase lives just down the road from you, in the same neighborhood. He has, for all intents and purposes, the same living conditions as you. He, however, has a job a little more enjoyable than you. He works weekends at Baskin Robbin's. Not the most exciting job ever, but it does the job.
Then the idea donned on you...
"Chase, you still play the drums, right?"
"Of course, why?"
"Dude, let's start a band!"
Chase was a very good drummer, but he'd never considered being a part of a band.
"A band? Here? Did you fall down the stairs and hit your head or something?" he asked.
"Chase, I'm serious. I think Johnny still plays guitar, we could get him to play bass," you say. Johnny was another one of your friends, also human. He had sandy blond hair that parted in the middle, and was very shy to anyone he didn't know well.
"And what about a singer? We can't sing,"
"Oh, I've got that covered. Just get a hold of Johnny, and I'll get our singer."
"Whatever."
After you hang up with Chase, you head straight for your phone book. You plan on calling Even. Even is a light brown fox, about a year younger than you. You'd only talked with him on a few occasions, but you'd heard him sing at many talent shows when he was in school, and he was amazing.
After a few rings, you hear Even's voice answer.
"Hello?" he says through the receiver.
"Hey. Even?" you ask.
"Yeah, who's this?" he asks.
"It's [your name]."
"How'd you get my number?"
"Found it in the book. Listen, would you like to join my band?"
"A band? I can't play any instrument."
"No, but you can sing. So, what do you say?"
1511.title: Male

choices: A skinny, petite Milk Snake naga
A busty, big hipped Albino python naga
1522.content: What species of naga are you?
1522.title: Female

155.content: Centaur? Minotaur or something else?
155.title: Unique

choices: Female 450 kg. Somewhat large bust and butt thin (for a centaur)
Male 350 kg. Tall, Very thin (for a centaur)
Female 700 kg. 12 months pregnant with 3 very large bust and butt
1551.content: What gender are you? How heavy are you? Tell me a little about yourself.
1551.title: Centaur

info.brief_description: Make a rock band with mythical creatures so you can get out of your bad neighbor hood.
info.description:
This reality is a lot like our own, kids go to school, adults go to work, there are good people and bad people. The main diffrence is that we are not alone, mythical creatures are not that mythical and roam around and do jobs like the rest of us, some of them are morphs and some are bipedal, yet they all lead lifes quite similar to our own.

You are an average teen who has just graduated highschool, unfortunatly, you didn't graduate with top scores for a scholarship. Now all you have is a crudy job in a crudy neighbor hood that isn't exactly kid friendly. You want out, but you don't have the money or much of a real reason to leave other than "you want out."

Your guitar has been your only true "important" possesion and you have gotten pritty good. Could this be your key out of this forsaken neighborhood and a profitable life, you decide.

Rules:
- Additions must be three or more scentences long (with very few exceptions)
- Romance is alowed as long as it's around PG13
- No slash (unless your talking about the guitarist, then go ahead)
- Keep things PG13, as in no drug addiction, but a fight here and there is a welcome addition
- Nothing realy gay, you can always have those little "odd" relationships, but nothing that gets real "personal"
- Don't end the story, but if you do at least give the option of continuing it, thank you.
